name: DEATH BOUND
description:
DESCRIPTION:

DEATH BOUND is a rogue-like set in a one minute time loop.

Your Health = Time. It's always ticking down. If you get damaged, you loose time.

Escape the procedurally generated dungeon before your time/health runs out.

Defeat different types of enemies and the final boss.

Collect randomized weapons, boosts and power-ups to heal, increase the time limit and/or upgrade your abilities.

FEATURES:
  • Procedural levels.
  • 4 Weapon types.
  • 4 Enemy types + Final Boss.
  • 6 Randomized Boosts + 3 Special Power-ups.
  • One minute base time limit.
CONTROLS:

Movement:

  • Keyboard - W, S, A, D / Arrows
  • Gamepad -  Left Thumbstick

Dash/Use Weapon:

  • Keyboard - SPACE
  • Gamepad - Face Button Down (A)
